import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update inventory stock record"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/inventories/{InventoryId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing inventory stock record with new values.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0).

**Updatable Fields**:
- `QuantityAvailable` - Current stock quantity
- `AverageCost` - Average unit cost
- `MinQuantityAvailable` - Reorder threshold
- `MaxQuantityAvailable` - Overstock threshold
- `TrackInventory` - Whether to actively track this stock
- `SupplierId` - Associated supplier
- `InventoryStateTypeId` - Current state type

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"InventoryId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the inventory stock record to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Updated inventory stock record data.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an inventory stock record.","properties":{"InventoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the inventory record (required for updates, generated on create)."},"InventoryItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the catalog item."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the location. Obtain via [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2), extract `Items[].LocationId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getMyLocationsV2","endpoint":"GET /api/v2.0/locations","responseField":"Items[].LocationId"}},"SupplierId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the associated supplier."},"TrackInventory":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to actively track inventory for this stock entry."},"QuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of units available."},"AverageCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Average cost per unit."},"MinQuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Minimum quantity threshold for reorder alerts."},"MaxQuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Maximum quantity threshold for overstock alerts."},"InventoryStateTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier describing the inventory state."}},"title":"UpdateInventoryRequest"},"example":{"QuantityAvailable":150,"AverageCost":28.75,"MinQuantityAvailable":15,"MaxQuantityAvailable":600}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
